member.name: T:Buildetech.OscKit.IOscServiceFactory
member.summary: Provides methods to create OSC client and server services.

member.name: M:Buildetech.OscKit.IOscServiceFactory.CreateClient(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create an OSC client service.
member.param: The remote address to which OSC messages should be sent.
The port that should be used at the remote address.

member.name: M:Buildetech.OscKit.IOscServiceFactory.CreateServer(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create an OSC server service.
member.param: The port on which we should listen for incoming OSC messages.

member.name: T:Buildetech.OscKit.OscKitExtensionMethods
member.summary: Extension methods for registering OSC Kit services in an IServiceCollection.

member.name: M:Buildetech.OscKit.OscKitExtensionMethods.AddOscClientService(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add a singleton instance of IOscClientService to the DI container.
member.param: The IServiceCollection object.
The IP Address of the OSC Server with which this client will communicate.
The port over which this client will transmit OSC messages.

member.name: M:Buildetech.OscKit.OscKitExtensionMethods.AddOscServerService(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add a singleton instance of IOscServerService to the DI container.
member.param: The IServiceCollection object.
The port on which the server should listen for OSC messges.

member.name: M:Buildetech.OscKit.OscMessageValues.GetTypeTag(System.Int32)
member.summary: Maps an OscCore type tag to an OscKit type tag
member.param: The index of the value in the received message.
member.returns: The type tag at the specified index.

member.name: M:Buildetech.OscKit.OscMessageValues.ForEachElement(System.Action{System.Int32,Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag})
member.summary: Runs a callback for each value in the message.
member.param: The callback to run.

member.name: T:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag
member.summary: Represents the supported OSC type tags in Buildetech.OscKit. These tags are used to identify the type of each element in an OSC message.

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.False
member.summary: False boolean value (F, non-standard).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.Infinitum
member.summary: Infinitum value (I, non-standard).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.Nil
member.summary: Nil/null value (N, non-standard).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.AltTypeString
member.summary: Alternate type string (S, non-standard).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.True
member.summary: True boolean value (T, non-standard).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.ArrayStart
member.summary: Array start ([, non-standard).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.ArrayEnd
member.summary: Array end (], non-standard).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.Blob
member.summary: Binary data blob (b, STANDARD).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.AsciiChar32
member.summary: ASCII character (c, non-standard).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.Float64
member.summary: 64-bit floating point number (d, non-standard).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.Float32
member.summary: 32-bit floating point number (f, STANDARD).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.Int64
member.summary: 64-bit integer (h, non-standard).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.Int32
member.summary: 32-bit integer (i, STANDARD).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.Midi
member.summary: Midi message (m, non-standard).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.Color32
member.summary: 32-bit RGBA color (r, non-standard).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.String
member.summary: String value (s, STANDARD).

member.name: F:Buildetech.OscKit.OscTypeTag.TimeTag
member.summary: OSC time tag (t, non-standard).

member.name: T:Buildetech.OscKit.Services.IOscServerService
member.summary: Represents a service for receiving and handling OSC (Open Sound Control) messages received from remote hosts.

member.name: M:Buildetech.OscKit.Services.IOscServerService.TryAddMethod(System.String,System.Action{Buildetech.OscKit.OscMessageValues})
member.summary: Adds a method callback for the specified OSC address.
member.param: The OSC address to monitor.
The callback to invoke when a message is received at the address.
member.returns: True if the method was added; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Buildetech.OscKit.Services.IOscServerService.RemoveMethod(System.String,System.Action{Buildetech.OscKit.OscMessageValues})
member.summary: Removes a method callback for the specified OSC address.
member.param: The OSC address to remove the callback from.
The callback to remove.
member.returns: True if the method was removed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Buildetech.OscKit.Services.IOscServerService.RemoveAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Removes all method callbacks for the specified OSC address.
member.param: The OSC address to remove.
member.returns: True if the address was removed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Buildetech.OscKit.Services.IOscServerService.AddMonitorCallback(Buildetech.OscKit.MonitorCallback)
member.summary: Adds a monitor callback that is invoked for every OSC message received.
member.param: The monitor callback to add.

member.name: M:Buildetech.OscKit.Services.IOscServerService.RemoveMonitorCallback(Buildetech.OscKit.MonitorCallback)
member.summary: Removes a monitor callback.
member.param: The monitor callback to remove.
member.returns: True if the callback was removed; otherwise, false.
